name: Finger Toons
description:
Compete with your fingers! After being one of the most downloaded games with more than 7,000,000 downloads, Digit and his finger friends are back with more events, more characters and more fun!

MULTIPLAYER MODE
==================
Compete online against finger-players around the world.
In each race you can win or lose trophies, either winning or losing races respectively, as you get more trophies you will raise your level, but keep in mind that if you lose you will also lose level.

CAMPAIGN MODE
==============
Compete for the Gold medal in each event, 100 meters dash, 110 meters hurdles, 400 meters dash and SWIM in the new event of 100 metres FREE STYLE!
Get trophies to raise your level so you can unlock characters and new disciplines.
In each race you can win virtual coins that will allow you to buy new characters.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER
=========================
Select from several finger-athletes from all countries, and choose how you think your own fingers would be competing in the Olympics.

CONSTANT UPDATES
================
Remember to always stay connected, new disciplines, new game modes and new characters will be launching with each update.

Are you fast with your fingers?
======================
Enter the TOP 100 ranking and prove to your friends who is the best Finger-athlete in Finger Toons now comes in 3D with many more characters from all countries, choose yours own Finger

Finally remember to keep always connected, new disciplines, game modes and Fingers Characters will be appearing on every update.

##### C´mon stop reading and show your friends who has the fastest Fingers in the World !! ######
